We're a non-profit organization focused on helping the people of Ukraine to overcome this terrible war

Achievements:

  • 01

    Trucks of Humanitarian

    45+ trucks of Humanitarian aid were met on the Polish border. The goods were accepted, sorted, and forwarded to people in hot spots and regions experiencing a humanitarian disaster

  • 02

    Equipment

    We continuously support the army with equipment like bulletproof vests, satellite phones, tactical gears and etc. We directly talk to hot spot representatives to better understand their needs and get advised by military experts on the products to supply

  • 03

    Manufacturing textile goods

    We started an initiative of manufacturing textile goods inside Ukraine and supporting the national production of ballistic plates and bulletproof vests. We help with raw materials supply

  • 04

    Coordinate volunteers

    We coordinate volunteers in finding specific equipment like long-range UAV and Night Vision
